title: Are You Carrying Your Keys Smart?
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -  KeySmart (USA Link) -  KeySmart (International Link) -   This cool little gadget changes the way you carry keys. It treats your keys similar to tools on a swiss army knife. This version of the KeySmart also ships with a USB key making it even more versatile.  From the manufacturer -  Made in the USA from aircraft aluminum, stanless steel, and a laser engraved logo.  No more pocket bulge or thigh poke.  Included loop ring to attach car fob's and other accessories.  Compact, quiet, and lightweight.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
